--- abbreviated_edge_left.sql
 <-
--- AST
&ast.GqlPathPattern{
  PathTermList: []*ast.GqlQuantifiablePathTerm{
    &ast.GqlQuantifiablePathTerm{
      Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
      PathTerm: &ast.GqlAbbreviatedEdgeLeft{
        First: 1,
        Last:  2,
      },
      Quantifier: nil,
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
<-
